question: What is the name of the village near Hogwarts where students often visit to buy supplies and enjoy some leisure time?

'My dad's Muggle-born and he's a right old slob. I suppose it varies, just as it does with wizards?'
'So - is it really true? You make a stag Patronus?'
'My philosophy is that worrying means you suffer twice.'

question: 'You're saying it wrong... It's Wing- gar-dium Levi-o-sa, make the "gar" nice and long.'
'Books! And cleverness! There are more important things - friendship and bravery'
'There's no need to call me "sir", Professor.'
'Wow, I wonder what it'd be like to have a difficult life?'
'Excuse me, are you the imprint of a departed soul?'
'Don't let it worry you... It's me. I'm extremely famous.'
'Just because you've got the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have'
'I mean we should tell them to get out. We don't want any more Dobbys, do we? We can't order them to die for us'
'Oh, of course... I forgot we'll be hunting down Voldemort in a mobile library.'
'No thanks... The poor toilet's never had anything as horrible as your head down it - it might be sick.'
